title: Chiropractic Medicine | Chiropractor in Providence, RI | Natural Alternatives Inc.
description: Chiropractic Medicine in Providence, RI. Natural Alternatives Inc. is your local Chiropractor in Providence serving all of your needs. Call us today at (401)-351-8960 for an appointment.
cleaned_text: Chiropractic Medicine Chiropractic medicine uses a natural approach allowing your body to heal itself. It is an alternative form of medicine that uses scientific fact to stimulate your body's remarkable resources. Chiropractors are the second largest of the three primary health care providers in the United States and the largest drugless health care profession in the world. Chiropractors help the body heal itself by treating the cause of the condition, not just the symptoms.
